PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01922018-03-06,  ESDC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS (CSFAR) in order to (1) expand eligibility for the Canada Student Grants for Part-Time Studies (CSG-PT), Canada Student Grants for Part-Time Students with Dependants and Canada Student Grants for Full-Time Students with Dependants and Canada Student Loans for Part Time Students (CSL-PT); (2) make available, for three years, non-repayable top-up funding for adult learners who qualify for the Canada Student Grant for Full-Time Students and who have been out of secondary school for at least ten years; (3) remove references to “previous year” family income to allow CSGs targeted to full-time students to be assessed using family income from a period determined by the appropriate authority designated by the Minister of Labour styled as Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Labour over a three year period; and (4) enhance the delivery of CSLs provided to eligible part-time students by allowing the Full-Time Master Student Financial Assistance Agreement to be available online.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0031 Publication Date: 2018-03-21
